cn.trinea.android.common.view

类 BorderScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScrollView
      • cn.trinea.android.common.view.BorderScrollView

  • public class BorderScrollView
extends ScrollView
    BorderScrollView
    • onTop and onBottom response ScrollView
    • you can setOnBorderListener(OnBorderListener) to set your top and bottom response
    作者:
    trinea@trinea.cn 2013-5-21

    • 嵌套类概要

      OnBorderListener, Called when scroll to top or bottom
